author: Special Correspondent
text:
Tamil Nadu Railway Police have booked a senior section engineer Sivan Kutralingam and the ballast screening machine operator, Ramesh, under the provisions of Indian Penal Code and Railway Act for Tuesday’s accident at a manned level crossing near Rajapalayam.

The police said that they were booked under two Sections of IPC for rash driving and endangering life or personal safety of others and Section 175 of Railway Act for endangering safety of persons by railway servant.

Further investigation is underway, the railway police said.
title: Two railway personnel booked for accident
